name: Village Protector
description:
Team: Siper Matt, Wang Zhixi, Xue Lawrence

Press direction or WSAD keys to move and space key to talk to NPC.

Left mouse key to attack. 

Use food resources to help replenish energy and health.

Collect materials combos to build weapons for fighting.

Objective:

1) Fight monsters 

2) Survive for 3 days. 

Food Resources: 

1) Vegetables (bring teacher flowers)
2) Meat (from killing monsters)

3) Bread (bring wood to baker)

4) Water

Materials Resources (for weapons):

1) Bone (probabilistically from killing monsters)

2) Wood (from tree)

3) iron

4) water

Build weapons by bringing materials combos to grocer:

1) Hammer: 1 wood + 1 iron

2) Axe: 3 wood + 4 iron

3) Sword: 4 water + 3 wood + 1 tone + 4 iron
